attributes.action: indefinitely ban T IN THE park.
attributes.additional_details: Over 2 life's every year have been taken that's a massive 10/12 life's over the last 5 years that's sadly no longer with us 100's if not 1000's of people fighting every year completely over capacity untrained staff on site drugs being passed about like sweeties woman being raped and sexually assaulted theft 100's of people feeling intimidated the list is endless it needs to stop something needs to be done
attributes.background: T in the park needs to be stopped indefinitely each year 2 or more people die No one should go to a festival and not go home to there loved ones. This year was the icing on the cake it needs to be stopped now!

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
